references.paper_title: DetectGPT: Zero-shot machine-generated text detection using probability curvature
references.reason: This paper introduces DetectGPT, a foundational zero-shot method for detecting LLM-generated text, which the current paper improves upon.

references.paper_title: DNA-GPT: Divergent N-gram analysis for training-free detection of GPT-generated text
references.reason: This paper proposes DNA-GPT, another significant zero-shot detection method that the current work enhances, highlighting the importance of probability distribution analysis in this field.

references.paper_title: Fast-DetectGPT: Efficient zero-shot detection of machine-generated text via conditional probability curvature
references.reason: This paper introduces Fast-DetectGPT, a highly efficient zero-shot detection method that serves as a baseline and is directly compared with the proposed method in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces the T5 text-to-text transformer model, which is used as a key component in several baseline methods compared to the current method, making it a relevant and important contribution.
